scripts.kill-ports: bash -lc 'lsof -nP -i:8081 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -nP -i:19000 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -nP -i:19001 -t | xargs -r kill -9'
scripts.start:clean: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" expo start -c --dev-client
scripts.start:optimized: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 4
scripts.start:ultra: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 4 --metro-config metro.config.optimized.js
scripts.analyze:bundle: npx expo export --platform all --output-dir ./dist && npx bundle-analyzer ./dist/index.js
